name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tykkr - Ridiculous Amounts of News, Now.

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A comprehensive and addicting news source.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The most addicting way to stay connected to the world around you, now in a convenient Chrome Extension.

Tykkr brings you scrolling news feeds from BBC News, CNN, Deadspin Sports, The Wall Street Journal, Discover Science, and many many more coming soon. In upcoming releases we'll be multiplying your news sources dramatically -- adding more national and world news sources, local news feeds, and custom news feeds -- all in one fast, lightweight, centralized location.

-- A Quick Note About Permissions --
Installing the Tykkr Chrome Extension requires the "read and change all website data" permission. Tykkr uses this permission only to access RSS feeds from the news sources it aggregates. No browsing data is read, collected, or used in any way, and no changes are made to any websites that you visit.

Please try Tykkr out and let us know about your experience by leaving a review. Enjoy!
